title: Emerald Polki Kundan Haaram: The Vanalakshmi Cascade
materials: High-Quality Zambian Emeralds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Exquisite Polki setting showcases the natural brilliance of uncut diamonds. The geometric design elements complement the vibrant Emeralds, arranged in a cascading pattern. A central, pear-shaped Emerald pendant adds regal charm. Traditional Kundan craftsmanship meets a modern, elegant design.
colors: and Sparkling White Polki Diamonds create a rich and captivating color palette.
occasions: and festive celebrations like Deepavali and Sankranthi. Makes a stunning statement piece for formal events and special occasions.
description: Timeless elegance with a modern twist. This Polki Kundan Haaram features high-quality Zambian Emeralds and expertly set Polki diamonds, making it a treasure to cherish for generations. The intricate design and superior craftsmanship ensure it remains a statement piece for any occasion. It's a valuable heirloom that embodies South Indian heritage.
